entry.title: Saturday: Chance of drizzle. High 17 with temperature falling to 10 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 17 with temperature falling to 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 7 except plus 3 in low lying inland areas. Risk of frost.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low 7 except plus 3 in low lying inland areas. Risk of frost. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 28 May 2016
